pages.title: Greenland Shark
pages.text: The Greenland shark has the longest known lifespan of all vertebrate species ($(o)estimated to be between 250 and 500 years$()), and is among the largest extant species of shark.$(br2)It is a generalist feeder, consuming a variety of available foods.

pages.title: Greenland Shark
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★★★$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 3$(br2)Growth time: 7 Days
